summary:
Haneda Airport, also known as Tokyo-Haneda, is one of Tokyo's main airports. It's located in ÅŒta, about 9 miles from central Tokyo. This airport mainly serves domestic flights and some international ones, especially to nearby Asian cities. Haneda is a hub for big Japanese airlines like Japan Airlines and All Nippon Airways.

In 2010, a new international terminal opened, allowing more long-haul flights. Haneda is now the third-busiest airport in Asia and has been ranked as one of the world's best airports. It can handle over 90 million passengers each year.
title: Haneda Airport
